title: Account hacked + chat banned
body: I got chat banned when i logged onto my account after not playing for a few weeks, and i come to see my account was 10 game chat banned + honor level removed, i can confirm i havent played in 2 weeks since i was on vaction and no one knows my password, so im asumming i got hacked. http://prntscr.com/gakhlk is the last games i ever played, i went on vaction from 7/15 to 8/16 and i just logged in and saw i was banned, i already changed my password but im more mad about the fact i lost my honor levels and got chat banned because of this person, i dont play jungle or top and this is what they played i was wondering if riot ever looked into this stuff, thank you.

replies.body:
This is why riot constantly reminds people not to give away their password on free RP sites.

Yet somehow, people are still too stupid..

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new is the place to create a ticket. If you use the option, "I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games" they will send you to the correct specialist to help you.
Submit a ticket to Riot - if they can confirm the account was compromised they *may* (key word: may) remove the punishment this one time.
